definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: This day, John sees a drama again, call 《park street murder case 》.
sentences.chinese: 这天，约翰又去看一出戏，叫《公园街谋杀案》。

sentences.english: You're the corpse in an English murder mystery.
sentences.chinese: 你就是英国神秘谋杀案里的死尸。

sentences.english: Murder cases in London listed. Photograph: Arthur Turner/Alamy
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的谋杀案列出来了。

sentences.english: The police are enquiring into the murder.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在调查这起谋杀案。

sentences.english: Police are interviewing 2 people in Atlanta after an apartment murder-suicide left 4 people dead.
sentences.chinese: 亚特兰大一公寓内发生自杀式谋杀案，导致4人死亡。

sentences.english: One floor below the murder, on the forty-fifth floor.
sentences.chinese: 在谋杀案现场的楼下，四十五楼。

sentences.english: Rupp was 16 at the time of the killings.
sentences.chinese: 在谋杀案发生的时候，普鲁十六岁。

sentences.english: The judge could give him twenty-five years to life for the murder.
sentences.chinese: 法官可能因为这件谋杀案判他二十五年徒刑。

sentences.english: The police promised to leave no stone unturned in solving the murder.
sentences.chinese: 警察承诺要想尽办法侦破那桩谋杀案。

sentences.english: At the moment of the murder, he is standing in front of television cameras and talking tactlessly.
sentences.chinese: 在谋杀案发生的时侯，他正站在摄像机前笨拙地讲话。

sentences.english: The police studied and backtracked the murder case.
sentences.chinese: 警方研究并循迹调查了这起谋杀案。

sentences.english: Mr Smith was believed to be an accessory to the murder .
sentences.chinese: 史密斯被认为是该谋杀案的从犯。

sentences.english: We've had murders, but nothing like this. This is just senseless.
sentences.chinese: 我们遇到过谋杀案，但从没有过这种案件，真是愚蠢。

sentences.english: The witness deposed that she had seen the accused on the day of the murder.
sentences.chinese: 证人宣誓证明在谋杀案发生当天她看见过被告。

sentences.english: Three of them throttled th’ victims like this.
sentences.chinese: 其中三起谋杀案的被害人都是这样被扼死的。

sentences.english: The police are investigating the murder case.
sentences.chinese: 警察正调查该宗谋杀案。

definition: murder as a crime of passion
to commit a crime or offence
